attributes.action: Remove RAF Newton from the potential sites list for an Eco Town as it is completely unsustainable in that location.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RAF Newton has well documented infrastructure problems relating to the local roads being hazzadous and gridlocked. No large scale development should be considered until the outcome of the A46 is decided and the dual carriage way is in place linking Newark to Leicester. Only 3 years ago a Planning Inspector ruled that Newton is an unsuitable location for any major development and that the infrastructure needs in the area were urgently met. 

There have been no improvements, only gridlocks and weekly accidents backing up to and from the M1 30 miles away!
